Blog.post: I started to design my own blog but then I decided to just follow the trend of using a site like this cause I'm so damn lazy So post what you think comments are welcome, and yeah!

yeah today was my 8 month anniversary with michelle. yeah we went to the mall. didnt do anything special walked around and got dinner went shopping and yeah. i bought her a tee shirt and jeans and she bought me a cd. (Beastie Boys- 5Boroughs) good cd! and yeah we went to the movies to finish it off. we saw the the bourne supremacy. good movie! the plot wasnt as good as the first but the stunts made up for it. ^_^ so over all the movie was as good as the first. yeah well I realised again today why I am deeply in love with Michelle. She is such a good person. she is beautiful, understanding, smart, and more than i can ask for. i know ive said this before but i gladdly call Michelle my one and only! and to restate the obvious I LOVE MICHELLE!

well i went back to the doctors today for a check up and well i got the cast off and got a few x-rays and i got an air cast. and if everything goes as planed i will be walking when school starts. so thats a yay!

well michelle came over for dinner, and a movie. well this was the first time that i have seen her in a week and a couple of days. as a short of a time that it may seem like i missed her soo much. and my heart was pounding when i first saw her. there is a feeling when you love someone so much and when you havent seen them in a really long time (in this case it was about a week) that you cant describe. it fills you with a warm and fuzzy feeling that sends chills down your spine and well ive come to reallize how much she means to me. and well i never want to let her go, because im prowd to say that she is my one and only.

well michelle came over for dinner, and a movie. well this was the first time that i have seen her in a week and a couple of days. as a short of a time that it may seem like i missed her soo much. and my heart was pounding when i first saw her. there is a feeling when you love someone so much and when you havent seen them in a really long time (in this case it was about a week) that you cant describe. it fills you with a warm and fuzzy feeling that sends chills down your spine and well ive come to reallize how much she means to me. and well i never want to let her go, because im prowd to say that she is my one and only.

well after talking it out for a bit with her i have found that this whole thing was like a really big misunderstanding and well i guess we both have to be more careful on how we express ourselves to each other or at lease give each other the chance to explain what they really meant. one thing that i have really learned is that communication is one of the biggest parts of a relationship and if there isnt any communication then there isnt a relationship.

well about an hour later i stoped being soo pissed at her and called her back. well you can guess that well we are back together and well we want to forget this morning. so hopefully everything works and yeah so love sucks and is the greatest feeling you will ever experience!
i think that it has been waiting to happen for a while now. but it picked this morning to happen. and well its finally happened. its over. live love and learn yeah love love is a joke.

ok well its about 10:30 michelle has come home form camp because of a feet problem and well her parents are giving her hell about our relationship well she says that she wants to take a break. not the problem i dont have a problem with this but my only question is WHAT THE HELL DOSE TAKING A BREAK MEAN?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!? really what the fuck dose it mean? if you can tell me ill give you a cookie!

yeah i was up last night couldnt sleep so i turned on the tv and turned showtime on and miami's most wanted was on. great movie. favoite line form the movie (Dam boy i offeded you a snack from the fridge not a dinner form the whole kitchen)

well i went to the doctors today and well he said that every thing is where it should be so i guess thats a plus. he also told me that this cast might come off in 2 weeks and ill just have a brace from then till the end of the three months so thats also great news.

well I broke my leg last monday and I havent been able to do much since. the most exciting thing that i have done was go to michelles house, but shes away at camp for two weeks(that really sucks) well the fait of my last month of summer depends on what the doctor hast to say tomorrow (i hope its good)
